text:
Compile India | Bangalore, India | Full-Time | Onsite

Our goal at Compile is simple: help organizations benefit from the intelligence thatâ€™s hidden under big data. Our customers, which include Fortune 500 to hyper-growth startups, use our insights to power their marketing engine.

But we want to do more. And that's where you come in. We are looking for a product-focused developer.

We are looking for generalists who are strong in building Web Systems and have good knowledge of Data Engineering. Checking every box isn't important; strong fundamentals and ability to learn are.

Fit the bill? Apply at https://www.compile.com/careers/software-engineer-web/
